document_data.name: Chime lamp
document_data.Description: Typically made of [[brass]], a chime lamp had attached to it a vented wheel that was set in motion by the rising hot [[air]] from the flame. The wheel had blades that struck an array of [[chime]]s made of crystal or [[brass]], producing a soothing sound. The lamp's light shone with a rosy glow.
document_data.Availability: Chime lamps imported from Evermeet were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''.
